sentences: Kershaw has worked with the band in various capacities since 1991, and in 2015, became the full-time replacement for original drummer Malcolm Holmes.
He is credited as a co-writer on multiple OMD releases, including the 1991 UK No. 3 hit, "Sailing on the Seven Seas".
In 1998, Kershaw co-founded girl group Atomic Kitten, alongside OMD frontman Andy McCluskey.
